comments.body: I think it's not pylint itself, but our own checks...
It is pylint.  There are a variety of bugs opened against pylint wrt namespace modules.  One has been fixed but others remain open including for this test.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +19,23 @@from ansible.module_utils._text import to_bytes

# Pylint doesn't understand Python3 namespace modules.
from ..change_detection import update_file_if_different  # pylint: disable=relative-beyond-top-level
from ..commands import Command  # pylint: disable=relative-beyond-top-level
